participant_1.background:
I saw an enormous whale while I was fishing with my uncle.
i enjoy being outside.
I enjoy strawberries because they are a sweet and juicy treat.
i work as a receptionist at a lawyers office.
I'd love to take my kids to the ballet in air conditioning.

participant_2.background:
My cosplay costume is coming in the mail, so I'm going to start practicing my makeup this weekend.
I read my favorite comic books to take my mind off of things.
My family works to support my dreams.
people do not like me too much but i like them anyways.
i am a karate black belt.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
Hey! My day is going pretty good. I am excited about my cosplay costume coming in the mail, so I will be practicing my makeup this weekend.
That is awesome! I am not very good at makeup. I do like to go fishing though. I once saw an enormous whale while I was fishing with my uncle!
I am not very good at fishing either, but I enjoy being outside. I also like to read comic books to take my mind off of things.
I love strawberries! They are so sweet and juicy. I would love to take my kids to the ballet in air conditioning.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love ballet, but I am not very good at it. I am a karate black belt though.
That is impressive! I am always impressed by people who are good at martial arts.
Thanks! I am glad my family works to support my dreams. I hope you have a great rest of your day!
You too! It was nice talking to you.
